sentences: Esad Muharemović (Serbo-Croatian Cyrillic: Есад Мухаремовић; born 22 February 1965), known by his stage name Esad Plavi (Serbo-Croatian Cyrillic: Есад Плави, "Esad the Blond / Blond Esad") is a Bosnian pop-folk singer.
His first contract was signed in 1989, and after a year he released his debut album Ne kuni što si voljela (Don't curse what you have loved).
